name: nfnan
params: setvar s0, wff w0, wff w1

body.origin:
|- wnf(s0, wnan(w0, w1))
-| wb(wnan(w0, w1), wn(wa(w0, w1)))
-| wnf(s0, wn(wa(w0, w1)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wnf(s0, wnan(w0, w1))
-| wb(wnan(w0, w1), wn(wa(w0, w1)))
-| wnf(s0, wn(wa(w0, w1)))

|- wnf(s0, wnan(w0, w1))
-| wnf(s0, wn(wa(w0, w1)))

body.origin:
|- wnf(s0, wn(wa(w0, w1)))
-| wnf(s0, wa(w0, w1))

cumulated.origin:
|- wnf(s0, wnan(w0, w1))
-| wnf(s0, wa(w0, w1))

body.origin:
|- wnf(s0, wa(w0, w1))
-| wnf(s0, w0)
-| wnf(s0, w1)

cumulated.origin:
|- wnf(s0, wnan(w0, w1))
-| wnf(s0, w0)
-| wnf(s0, w1)

comment: If ` x ` is not free in ` ph ` and ` ps ` , then it is not free in ` ( ph -/\ ps ) ` . (Contributed by Scott Fenton, 2-Jan-2018.)
